comment.author: 97319282@N04
comment._content: These are tickets for getting on a ropeway or entering shrines. Top left is the one for getting on a Miyajima Ropeway in Hiroshima Prefecture, the top centre is admission ticket for Izumo Taisha in Shimane Prefecture, one of the most important shrine in Japan. The middle right is a ticket for a downstream boat, called Hozugawa Kudari, a very popular leisure attraction in Kyoto. I am not sure about the rest of them.
